tool_description: API showing the technology news from different newspapers
name: Technology News
title: Technology News

api_list.name: Get individual News Resource News
api_list.description: Get technology news from specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-news1.p.rapidapi.com/tech-news/dawn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-news1.p.rapidapi.com/tech-news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
